Items.SQL: SELECT ID, Name, ParentID, Description FROM __mj.vwAIPromptCategories ORDER BY Name
SELECT ID, Name, Description, CategoryID, Status, __mj_CreatedAt, __mj_UpdatedAt FROM __mj.vwAIPrompts ORDER BY Name

messages.content: I'd like an interactive viewer for my AI Prompts showing categories and prompts in a way that i can nav in and out of em, make it pretty with pastels

good work. what's missing is that some prompts are not categorized. Initially upon load you can see those, but then as soon as you click a category you can't go back and see those, so please make it possible to see the "Uncategorized" as well as those in categories. Also, go crazy with Canadian and 
rasta colors on this next iteration eh? :)
nice work. thninking we should take v1 and switch right to left panes and vice versa
use the rasta version and do the left->right switch, but also make sure the drill into the prompt info works, it didn't work in the last cut
My work on your request is complete.

userExplanation: This is an updated viewer for your AI prompts. The layout has been reversed: now you'll see the main content (your prompt list or details) on the left, and the category selection sidebar on the right. We've also fixed the bug where clicking a prompt in the list didn't show its detailsâ€”that now works perfectly. Enjoy the same vibrant Canadian and Rasta theme with a more intuitive layout!
techExplanation: This component has been refactored to address key layout and functional requirements. The top-level flex container now renders the main content panel before the sidebar, achieving a `[Main Content | Sidebar]` layout. The sidebar's `borderRight` has been correctly changed to a `borderLeft`. A critical bug in the drill-down functionality was fixed by ensuring the root component's `handleComponentEvent` properly processes the `itemSelected` event from `PromptListCanadianRasta`, updating the `selectedPromptID` state and triggering the conditional render of `PromptDetailCanadianRasta`.
reportTitle: AI Prompt Viewer: Canadian & Rasta Theme (Fixed Layout & Drill-Down)

option.functionalRequirements: This component is an interactive viewer for AI prompts. The layout is composed of two main panels: a main content area on the left and a category sidebar on the right. The main content area initially displays a list of prompts. When a user clicks on a prompt from this list, the view drills down to show the detailed information for that specific prompt. The sidebar on the right allows users to filter the prompt list by category. It includes a hierarchical, expandable tree of categories and a persistent, always-visible 'Uncategorized' option, which is styled distinctively. Selecting 'Uncategorized' correctly filters the list to show prompts that have no assigned category. The entire component maintains a vibrant 'Canadian & Rasta' theme, using reds, whites, greens, and yellows, along with motifs like maple leaves and reggae patterns, ensuring a playful yet functional user experience.
option.technicalDesign:
The root component, `AIPromptViewerFixed`, manages the application's overall state, including `selectedCategoryID` and `selectedPromptID`. The main layout is a flex container with `flex-direction: row`. The first child is the main content panel (`flex: 1`), and the second is the sidebar (fixed-width). The border that separates the panels is now a `borderLeft` on the sidebar's container.

A critical bug fix is implemented in the event handling logic. The `handleComponentEvent` function now robustly handles the `itemSelected` event from the `PromptListCanadianRasta` component. When this event is received, the handler updates the `selectedPromptID` in the root state with the `itemId` from the event payload. This state change triggers a conditional render in the main content panel, switching the view from `PromptListCanadianRasta` to `PromptDetailCanadianRasta`. The data for the selected prompt is retrieved from the main data context and passed as a prop to the detail component. Clicking the 'Back' button in the detail view resets `selectedPromptID` to `null`, returning the user to the list view. The 'Canadian & Rasta' theme is preserved across all components and states.
option.description: An interactive AI prompt viewer with a fixed layout: main content on the left and a category sidebar on the right. The component features a robust drill-down from a prompt list to a detail view and retains its unique 'Canadian & Rasta' theme.

stateStructure.selectedCategoryID: Stores the ID of the currently selected category from the sidebar, or a special value ('__UNCATEGORIZED__') for uncategorized prompts.
stateStructure.selectedPromptID: Stores the ID of the prompt selected for viewing. If null, the prompt list is shown. If an ID is present, the detail view is shown.
stateStructure.sidebar: State object for the CategorySidebarCanadianRasta component, likely for tracking expanded nodes.
stateStructure.promptList: State object for the PromptListCanadianRasta component, for tracking focus or scroll position.
stateStructure.promptDetail: State object for the PromptDetailCanadianRasta component.

childComponents.exampleUsage:
<CategorySidebarCanadianRasta
  data={categories}
  config={{
    uncategorizedId: UNCATEGORIZED_ID,
  }}
  userState={fullUserState.sidebar || {}}
  onEvent={handleComponentEvent}
  styles={styles}
  callbacks={callbacks}
  utilities={utilities}
  statePath="sidebar"
  selectedCategoryID={fullUserState.selectedCategoryID}
/>
childComponents.description:
Functional Requirements: A component that renders a hierarchical list of categories for filtering. It MUST include a persistent and visually distinct 'Uncategorized' option that is always visible. When a category or 'Uncategorized' is selected, it must fire an `itemSelected` event with the corresponding `itemId`. The component must be fully keyboard accessible and visually indicate the currently selected item. The entire component must adhere to the 'Canadian & Rasta' theme, using specified colors and motifs. It should handle having no categories gracefully by showing a themed empty state message.

Technical Requirements: The component receives a flat list of categories and should build a tree structure based on `ID` and `ParentID` properties. It also receives `selectedCategoryID` as a prop to correctly highlight the active item. A special `uncategorizedId` is passed in the `config` prop for the 'Uncategorized' node. All visual styling should be derived from the `styles` prop but heavily augmented to achieve the theme. State changes, like expanding a tree node, should be communicated via a `stateChanged` event.

childComponents.exampleUsage:
<PromptListCanadianRasta
  data={filteredPrompts}
  config={{}}
  userState={fullUserState.promptList || {}}
  onEvent={handleComponentEvent}
  styles={styles}
  callbacks={callbacks}
  utilities={utilities}
  statePath="promptList"
/>
childComponents.description:
Functional Requirements: Displays a list of AI prompts as interactive cards. Each card shows the prompt's `Name` and `Description`. CRITICAL: When a user clicks a prompt card, the component MUST fire an `itemSelected` event with a payload `{ itemId: prompt.ID }` to enable drill-down. The component must be fully keyboard navigable (up/down arrows, enter/space to select). It must display a prominent, themed empty state message if the data array is empty. The visual design of the cards must strictly adhere to the 'Canadian & Rasta' theme, with vibrant backgrounds, borders, and icons.

Technical Requirements: The component receives an array of prompt objects in its `data` prop. It should map over this array to render the cards, using the prompt's `ID` as the React `key`. Interactive states (hover, focus, selected) must have distinct styling. The component should manage its own internal state for keyboard focus and communicate it up via the standard `stateChanged` event.

childComponents.exampleUsage:
<PromptDetailCanadianRasta
  data={selectedPrompt}
  config={{}}
  userState={fullUserState.promptDetail || {}}
  onEvent={handleComponentEvent}
  styles={styles}
  callbacks={callbacks}
  utilities={utilities}
  statePath="promptDetail"
/>
childComponents.description:
Functional Requirements: Displays the full details of a single selected prompt, including `Name`, `Description`, `Status`, `__mj_CreatedAt`, and `__mj_UpdatedAt`. It must include a highly visible and accessible 'Back' button. Clicking this button must trigger a return to the prompt list. The layout should be clean and readable, while fully embracing the 'Canadian & Rasta' theme with decorative headers, themed field displays, and color accents.

Technical Requirements: The component receives a single prompt object in its `data` prop. It should gracefully handle cases where fields are null or undefined. The 'Back' button, on click, MUST fire an `actionTriggered` event with a payload `{ action: 'back' }`. Dates should be formatted for readability. All styling must use the 'Canadian & Rasta' theme elements passed via styles or defined internally.
